description:
I have done this exact course at university, so i am able to explain the concepts in a manner that students understand. Ultimately, i know how and why people struggle with manufacturing calculations, and I can help make it easier for you.

How is the course structured?

  1. Basic Manufacturing
  2. Turning
  3. Punching
  4. Milling
  5. Holding and Drawing Force
  6. Feasibility Ratios
  7. Drilling 
  8. Bending
  9. Centrifugal Casting
  10. Production Cycle Time

Why enroll in "Become a Manufacturing Pro!"?

  • Over 20 FREE worked through examples with Very-Easy-to-Understand explanations.
  • Tips and tricks on how to study as well as how to save time in tests and exams.
  • Work at your own pace leaving you comfortable and confident for those final exams!

This course is perfect for anyone currently enrolled in a manufacturing class, anyone planning to take it in the near future, or anyone who's interested in learning basic manufacturing calculations. So whether you're looking to just pass or get your distinction, this course will provide you with the necessary tools to help you reach your goals!
title: Become a Manufacturing Pro!
